sqlMessage: In aggregated query without GROUP BY, expression #1 of SELECT list contains nonaggregated column 'ds_public.ds_system.did'; this is incompatible with sql_mode=only_full_group_by
sql:
select ds_system.did as ds_system_did,ds_system.ds_key as ds_system_ds_key,ds_system.ds_name as ds_system_ds_name,ds_system.ds_type as ds_system_ds_type,ds_system.ds_dec as ds_system_ds_dec,ds_system.ds_update_time as ds_system_ds_update_time,ds_system.ds_create_time as ds_system_ds_create_time, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_system_module.did) as ds_system_module_did, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_system_module.ds_left_did) as ds_system_module_ds_left_did, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_system_module.ds_right_did) as ds_system_module_ds_right_did, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_system_module.ds_update_time) as ds_system_module_ds_update_time, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_system_module.ds_create_time) as ds_system_module_ds_create_time
                                    from ds_system
                                    left join ds_system_module on ds_system_module.ds_left_did=ds_system.did  left join ds_module on ds_module.did=ds_system_module.ds_right_did
